DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: SILVA, H. D.;DУRIA SILVA, HUMBERTO;Silva, Humberto Dуria;Silva, H. D.;H Doria-Silva;Humberto D. Silva;Silva, Humberto D.;Humberto Dуria Silva;D. Silva, Humberto

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Graduado em Engenharia Elйtrica (1974), mestrado em Ciкncias da Computaзгo (1980), (dissertaзгo: Grafos aplicados a estudos de confiabilidade de sistemas de potкncia), ambos pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco e doutorado em Engenharia Quнmica, por equivalкncia ao Gйnie Des Procйdйs - Institut National Polytechnique de Lorraine (1998), (tese: Etude de la Rйpartition de la Lumiиre dans un Rйacteur Photocatalytique Solaire). Em 2011 criou o Grupo de pesquisa no CNPq, Transferкncia de massa em meio poroso flexнvel. Atualmente (desde 2020), й professor titular da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (tese: Etiopatogenia da desidrataзгo intramuscular e intraocular do neonato ao idoso). Tem experiкncia na бrea de Ciкncia da Computaзгo, com кnfase em Matemбtica da Computaзгo, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: simulaзгo de sistemas dinвmicos, processos fotocatalнticos e transferкncia de massa em meio poroso flexнvel.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Electrical Engineering (1974), Master's degree in Computer Science (1980), (dissertation: Graphs applied to reliability studies of power systems), both from the Federal University of Pernambuco and PhD in Chemical Engineering, equivalent to the Gйnie Des Procйdйs - Institut National Polytechnique de Lorraine (1998), (thesis: Etude de la Rйpartition de la Lumiиre dans un Rйacteur Photocatalytique Solaire). In 2011 he created the research group at CNPq, Mass transfer in flexible porous media. Currently (since 2020), he is a full professor at the Federal University of Pernambuco (thesis: Etiopathogenesis of intramuscular and intraocular dehydration from newborns to the elderly). He has experience in the area of #8203;#8203;Computer Science, with an emphasis on Computer Mathematics, working mainly on the following topics: simulation of dynamic systems, photocatalytic processes and mass transfer in flexible porous media.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Lists the symptoms of myopia, hyperopia, astigmatism and presbyopia as originating from the same cause: the dehydrated accumulation of the secretions intraocular metabolics.
